bibl.title: Ptolemaic Grain, Seaways and Power.
The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.

bibl.note: Egyptian grain exports before the Ptolemies. - Production and export of grain in Ptolemaic Egypt. - The wider framework of Ptolemaic foreign policy and grain. - Conditions of safety for grain transport. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Kostas Buraselis, Ptolemaic Grain, Seaways and Power.
Kostas Buraselis, Mary Stefanou & Dorothy J. Thompson (edd.), The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 97-107.

Egyptian grain exports before the Ptolemies. - Production and export of grain in Ptolemaic Egypt. - The wider framework of Ptolemaic foreign policy and grain. - Conditions of safety for grain transport. - Conclusions.
